title: Switch
description: Have you ever switched places with another version of yourself? A seemingly better version at that?Yeah, me either. Until I did.I am Empress and making a hash of everything. Mistakes that come out when I am finally reunited with my family. My mother is on hand to fix it, but it means having to lie to everyone I love.When my father makes his unwanted appearance, it leads to a catastrophic event which could mean the end of my relationship with my sire. Will I be able to forgive him?A Paranormal Reverse Harem Series: M/M/M/M/M/M/M/F*Secrets: The Forever Series, Book 8 - available now.THE OTHER SWITCH: The Forever Series takes a slight detour in this novella into the life of Empress Aefre.
author: Eve Newton
